definition: coordinating by causing to indicate the same time
details:
noun
- coordinating by causing to indicate the same time
= example: coordinating by causing to indicate the same time
= synonyms: synchronisation, synchronizing
- an adjustment that causes something to occur or recur in unison
= synonyms: synchronisation, synchronizing, synchronising
- the relation that exists when things occur at the same time
= synonyms: synchronisation, synchronizing, synchronism, synchrony, synchronicity, synchroneity
